name: Arba3meyeh 400 Scoreboard
description:
This app is designed to replace the traditional Arba3meyeh game score tracking with pen and paper. The algorithm has been programmed to auto-calculate the progressive points of each player based on the Arba3meyeh game rules. No confusion, no mistakes, no fights, no cheating!

* Keep track of the running score with no room for error
* No need for pen and paper - play anywhere anytime!
* Full record of gameplay history
* Customise team and player names

Play with friends, keep your friends with the 400 scoreboard app.

*** 70% off for a limited time only ***

Features
* Input bids, Lock in results
* Automatic calculation based on bids/results
* Game history of full game scoreboard
* Custom team & player name input
* Bid selection scroll based on player point bracket
* 41, 44 and custom point settings
* Game rules outline
* Invite Friends via SMS
* Share to Facebook
